title: QualWeb
creator: Faculdade de Ciências da Universidade de Lisboa
description: QualWeb is an automated accessibility checker that assesses webpage conformance to ACT-Rules and WCAG 2.1 HTML and CSS techniques. QualWeb can be used as part of your application, through a command line interface or via its website. QualWeb is the engine of the Portuguese Accessibility Observatory.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
